%!tikz editor 1.0
\documentclass[convert={density=2000,size=600x600,outext=.png}]{standalone}
%\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{tikzsymbols}
\usepackage{tikz}
\usepackage[graphics, active, tightpage]{preview}
\PreviewEnvironment{tikzpicture}
\usetikzlibrary{backgrounds}

%!tikz preamble begin
\usetikzlibrary{arrows}
\usepackage{pstricks}
\usepackage{pstricks-add}
\usetikzlibrary{pgfplots.groupplots} 
\usetikzlibrary{colorbrewer}
\usepackage{pgfplots}
\usetikzlibrary{plotmarks}
\usetikzlibrary{calc}
\usetikzlibrary{pgfplots.polar}
\usepackage{subcaption}
%!tikz preamble end

\definecolor{JuliaBlue}{RGB}{64.256, 99.328, 216.832}
\definecolor{JuliaBlueL}{RGB}{102.4, 130.56, 224.768   }
\definecolor{JuliaPurple}{RGB}{149.504, 88.32, 178.688}
\definecolor{JuliaPurpleL}{RGB}{170.752, 121.6, 193.792}
\definecolor{JuliaGreen}{RGB}{56.32, 152.576, 38.144}
\definecolor{JuliaGreenL}{RGB}{96.256, 173.568, 81.408}
\definecolor{JuliaRed}{RGB}{203.776, 60.16, 51.2}
\definecolor{JuliaRedL}{RGB}{213.76, 99.328, 92.416}

\begin{document}
%!tikz source begin
\begin{tikzpicture}

\newcommand{\LW}{1.3}

\tikzset{
	% Mic style
myarc/.pic={ 
\draw[pic actions] (-1,0) to (-0.8,0) arc (0:180:-0.9 and 0.9) arc (0:180:1 and 1);
},
}

\pic[JuliaBlueL,fill=JuliaBlue,line width=\LW] (n1) at (0,0) {myarc} ;
\pic[JuliaBlueL,fill=JuliaBlue,line width=\LW, rotate = -180] (n2) at (0,0) {myarc} ;

\draw[JuliaGreen,fill=JuliaGreenL,line width=\LW] (0,0) circle (0.2);

\draw[JuliaRed,fill=JuliaRedL,line width=\LW] (0.3,0.4) circle (0.2);
\draw[JuliaRed,fill=JuliaRedL,line width=\LW] (-0.3,-0.4) circle (0.2);

\draw[JuliaPurple,fill=JuliaPurpleL,line width=\LW] (-0.3,0.4) circle (0.2);
\draw[JuliaPurple,fill=JuliaPurpleL,line width=\LW] (0.3,-0.4) circle (0.2);



\end{tikzpicture}

\end{document}
